title: Author flows
content:
The major steps in creating a flow are:

  1. Create a new flow in the project.
  2. Add steps to the flow.
  3. Create navigation lines to connect between steps.
  4. Add result steps (success, failure, custom) to the end points of the flow.
  5. Set up inputs and outputs for the flow.
  6. Set up the values of inputs and outputs for steps.
  7. Change the start step.

  8. Create flows with loops.
